Title: Maintain public hygiene, protect social morality
Publisher: Ningxia Hui Zizhiqu aiguo weisheng yundong weiyuanhui, Ningxia Hui zizhiqu weishengting (宁夏回自治区爱国卫生运动委员会，宁夏回自治区卫生厅)
Notes: The texts on the signs read: "Patriotic hygiene is everyone's responsibility!" (爱国卫生人人有责！) and "Do a good job in environmental hygiene!" (搞好环境卫生！)
